name: WANDERER (Monsters Must Die!, n3buluz)
description:
Welcome to the future! You are the pilot of the WANDERER, humanity’s last hope to find a habitable planet in the far reaches of the known universe.

Discover ancient technology, meet strange aliens AND PUNCH THEM IN THE FACE! Because nothing will stop you in your mission to colonize this bountiful exotic new world.

What are you waiting for PILOT? Strap in and blast off into this brand new mecha-powered space adventure by MONSTERS MUST DIE!

WANDERER is a bite-sized card battler made for the Beginners Circle Jam #3. If you enjoyed it, sharing is caring! And if you want to drop a comment or feedback, go right ahead!

Rocket-Punch your way to the top!

  • Game Design and Art - monstersmustdie.itch.io
  • Programming - n3buluz.itch.io
  • Cover Art - Veria Guimet
